recipes: If I can afford to pay the fees, I may grow my strength - or learn something of myself besides. But I may come to harm.
If I can afford to buy the necessary texts and journals, I can extend my knowledge. But the pursuit of truth has its risks.
Experience is the best teacher. I've glimpsed something greater. I'll seek it in sensation: the pleasures of sight, flesh and spirit. But all delights have their dangers.
